entry.title: WriteTest
entry.content:
字前tab会加灰框，还能拉长，如果不换行，有拉条。和代码一样
用来表示几级标题# frist title## second title### third title

frist title

second title

third title

![name](url) 显示链接的图片link:![this is page](http://obzf7z93c.bkt.clouddn.com/themeauthor.jpg)

link:

[name](url) 文字超链接[bilibili](https://www.bilibili.com/)

bilibili

[![xxx](图片url)][要转移到的链接]图片超链接[![enene](http://obzf7z93c.bkt.clouddn.com/themeauthor.jpg)](https://nodesource.com/products/nsolid)

hello:      - one      - two      - three

eg:
hello:

  • one
  • two
  • three
关键字对上跳转的意思吧，[内容]和文章最后的[内容1](链接)对上可以变成超链接，前后内容忽略大小写，也能匹配。这里注意最后一个，如果最后几个字也要跳转，单单加[1]没用得再加[2]来达到目的，此时内容为1，但是跳转到的目的为2，Markdown is a lightweight markup language based on the formatting conventions that people        naturally use in email.  As [John Gruber] writes on the [Markdown site]

Markdown is a lightweight markup language based on the formatting conventions that people naturally use in email. As John Gruber writes on the Markdown site

> The overriding design goal for Markdown's> formatting syntax is to make it as readable> as possible. The idea is that.

eg:

The overriding design goal for Markdown’s
formatting syntax is to make it as readable
as possible. The idea is that.

代码表示

eg:

制表第一行和第二行列必须对应数量相等，- 至少一个| Plugin | README | sdflj || ------ | ------ | --- || Dropbox | [plugins/dropbox/README.md][PlDb] | dsf || Github | [plugins/github/README.md][PlGh] | sdf || Google Drive | [plugins/googledrive/README.md][PlGd] | dsfs || OneDrive | [plugins/onedrive/README.md][PlOd] | dsfj || Medium | [plugins/medium/README.md][PlMe]| Google Analytics | [plugins/googleanalytics/README.md][PlGa] |

eg:
| Plugin | README | sdflj |
| —— | —— | — |
| Dropbox | plugins/dropbox/README.md | dsf |
| Github | plugins/github/README.md | sdf |
| Google Drive | plugins/googledrive/README.md | dsfs |
| OneDrive | plugins/onedrive/README.md | dsfj |
| Medium | plugins/medium/README.md
| Google Analytics | plugins/googleanalytics/README.md |

eg：
This will create the dillinger image and pull in the necessary dependencies. Be sure to swap out ${package.json.version} with the actual version of Dillinger.

`xxx` 背景颜色加灰`I love you red line`

eg:
I love you red line

MIT

加粗 ** xxx **

Free Software, Hell Yeah!

待更新

附录：[dill]: <https://github.com/joemccann/dillinger>[git-repo-url]: <https://github.com/joemccann/dillinger.git>[john gruber]: <http://daringfireball.net>[df1]: <http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/>[PlMe]: <https://github.com/joemccann/dillinger/tree/master/plugins/medium/README.md>[PlGa]: <https://github.com/RahulHP/dillinger/blob/master/plugins/googleanalytics/README.md>
